body_html:
I understand @hadim position. I hope that TF start to listen a little bit more users requests to let be a little bit community driven. For TF I suggest to play an active role on ONNX so they could try to let it to be owned by a more indipendent entity like:
https://www.partnershiponai.org
https://www.linuxfoundation.org/projects/deep-learning/

body:
I understand @hadim position. I hope  that TF start to listen a little bit more users requests to let be a little bit community driven. For TF I suggest to play an active role on ONNX so they could try to let it to be owned by a more indipendent entity like:
https://www.partnershiponai.org
https://www.linuxfoundation.org/projects/deep-learning/
